projects.name: Amazon Clone with stripe payment intrigation
projects.description: E-commerce web application built with React.js & Express server.This is a clone version of Amazon.
features: User can visit products, add to wishlist or cart, order & can payment via Mastercard, Visa, China UnionPay (CUP), Discover & Diners etc.
Payment System intrigrated using Strip payment getways.
Real Time Database of firebase used to make the Orders History Page.
All state are managed my React Context api.

projects.name: My Personal Blog site
projects.description: A fully responsive blog site is built using Bootstrap,Node,Express,MongooDB.
features: Admin can register, login & logout which is managed by Passport Authentication.)
Admin dashboard implemented where admin can manages CRUD (create, read, update and delete) operations.
TinyMCE rich text editor gives admit's total control over post creation
Authorization and validation handled properly. General user can't visit admin related sections.
Admin can handle subscribe user by Mailchimp.
